title: Trimming, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: plain weave patterned by extra warp floats and extra weft loops for fringe
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 765 x 4 cm (25 ft. 1 3/16 in. x 1 9/16 in.)
description: Red and green wool fringed scallops on a neutral foundation with a fine light blue stripe.
